text:
When developing JavaSamplers, I found that the search_paths parameter in the 
properties file is ignored.  The jmeter utils methof for search paths is hard 
coded to return [INSTALL_DIR]/lib/ext.  JMEter uses this path to search for 
anything that implements JavaSamplerClient Interface to add to the drop down 
list of java samplers.
creator: allengeary_jr@hotmail.com
